languages.text: "Я сказал..." {n}Пальцы Маражая стискивают ваше горло, а его голос превращается в шипение.{/n} "Убей. Одного. Из зачинщиков. Мне. На потеху".
"I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."
languages.original_text: "Я сказал..." {n}Пальцы Маражая стискивают ваше горло, а его голос превращается в шипение.{/n} "Убей. Одного. Из зачинщиков. Мне. На потеху".

traits.locale_text: "I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我刚刚说……”{n}玛拉斋收紧了扼在你脖子上的手。{/n}“杀掉，领头的，让我，开心开心。”
languages.original_text: "I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."

traits.locale_text: “我刚刚说……”{n}玛拉斋收紧了扼在你脖子上的手。{/n}“杀掉，领头的，让我，开心开心。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «He dicho...». {n}Los dedos de Marazhai te estrujan la garganta y su voz se reduce a un siseo.{/n} «Mata. A uno. De los oficiales. Para divertirme».
languages.original_text: "I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."

traits.locale_text: «He dicho...». {n}Los dedos de Marazhai te estrujan la garganta y su voz se reduce a un siseo.{/n} «Mata. A uno. De los oficiales. Para divertirme».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai dit... » {n}La main de Marazhai se referme sur votre gorge et sa voix se mue en un sifflement.{/n} « Tuez. un. des meneurs. J'ai envie. de me divertir. »
languages.original_text: "I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai dit... » {n}La main de Marazhai se referme sur votre gorge et sa voix se mue en un sifflement.{/n} « Tuez. un. des meneurs. J'ai envie. de me divertir. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sagte ..." {n}Mit seinen Fingern schnürt dir Marazhai die Kehle ab und seine Stimme wird zu einem Fauchen.{/n} "Tötet. Einen. Der Rädelsführer. Zu meinem. Vergnügen."
languages.original_text: "I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sagte ..." {n}Mit seinen Fingern schnürt dir Marazhai die Kehle ab und seine Stimme wird zu einem Fauchen.{/n} "Tötet. Einen. Der Rädelsführer. Zu meinem. Vergnügen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「言っただろう…」{n}マラズハイの指があなたの喉を圧迫し、その声が甲高いものに変わる。{/n}「殺せ。1人を。首謀者を。俺の。楽しみのために」
languages.original_text: "I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."

traits.locale_text: 「言っただろう…」{n}マラズハイの指があなたの喉を圧迫し、その声が甲高いものに変わる。{/n}「殺せ。1人を。首謀者を。俺の。楽しみのために」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Dedim ki..." {n}Marazhai, parmaklarıyla boğazını sıkıyor. Sesi tıslamaya dönüyor.{/n} "Elebaşlarından. Birini. Öldür de. Keyfim. Yerine gelsin."
languages.original_text: "I said..." {n}Marazhai's fingers squeeze your throat and his voice turns into a hiss.{/n} "Kill. One. Of the ringleaders. For my. Amusement."

traits.locale_text: "Dedim ki..." {n}Marazhai'ın parmakları boğazını sıkıyor ve sesi tıslamaya dönüyor.{/n} "Elebaşlarından. Birini. Öldür de. Keyfim. Yerine gelsin."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
